long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Key Features:

Fetch Power Usage Data: Retrieve power usage data from the Huawei FusionSolar monitoring website for any specified date or time period.
Visualize Power Usage: Plot the power usage and product power data on a chart, providing a clear visualization of your energy consumption patterns.
Time-of-Use Billing Calculation: Calculate your electricity bills based on time-of-use rates, taking into account different billing rates for on-peak and off-peak hours.
Bill Analysis: Obtain detailed information on the total bills, bills with and without PV (photovoltaic) generation, and separate on-peak and off-peak bills.
Flexible Date Selection: Easily select specific dates or choose an entire month for analyzing power consumption patterns.
